Token.Abstract: The intention of CNSplitView was to create an extended version of the standard NSSplitView to implement the so beloved feature of Brandon Walkin's BWToolkit that has support for an anchored toolbar. Since the release of Xcode 4 Apple broke with the less or more well known plugin structure of Xcode 3 and BWToolkit is no longer supported.
Adds a toolbar besides a CNSplitView's subview.

Parameter.Name: theSubviewIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The subview's index the toolbar will be attached to. The first index 0 is the leftmost (on vertical orientation) or the topmost (on horizontal orientation) subview.

Parameter.Name: theEdge
Parameter.Abstract: A value provided by the CNSplitViewToolbarEdge enum.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: YES the toolbar will be shown using a slide in animation, otherwise NO for no animation.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: YES the toolbar will be hidden using a slide out animation, otherwise NO for no animation.
